entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
